content.rendered:
Directed by A.L. Vijay

Written by Vijayendra Prasad. A.L. Vijay. Rajat Arora. Madhan Karky. Rajat Arora. Vijayendra Prasad

Cast Kangana Ranaut(J. Jayalalithaa). Arvind Swami(M.J. Ramachandran). Nassar(Karunanidhi). Samuthirakani(R.N. Veerappan (Tamil & Telugu Version) (as P.Samuthirakani)). Raj Arjun(R.N. Veerappan (Hindi Version)). Bhagyashree Patwardhan(Sandhya (as Bhagyashree)). Madhoo(V. N. Janaki Ramachandran (as Madhubala)). Jisshu Sengupta(Sobhan Babu). Thambi Ramaiah(Madhavan). Radha Ravi(M.R. Radha). Shamna Kasim(V.K. Sasikala).Bharath Reddy. Jayakumar(Duraimurugan / Vaiko).Vidya Pradeep. Flora Jacob(Indira Gandhi). A.R. Manikandan(Moorthy). Shanmugarajan(Valampuri John (as Shanmugha Rajan)). Nitya Sheety(Madhavan). Pavani(Revathi Nadhanphanindra B). Arunachalam(Voleti Jayaram). Saivam Ravi(Muralidhran). Marudhanayagam(Prathap). Bharani(Harish). Senthil Kumaran(Balaji Mohan). Kiran Varanasi(Dr. Baskar). Gouri Shankar(Phanidar). Harishchandra B.B.(Subash (as Harishchandra BB)). Satya Krishna(Monolisa). Gorithi Srinivas(Samaseema Reddy). Sridhar(Kiran Varanasi). Jawahar(Sujatha). Viral(Priya). P.S. Mosses(Kanchan (as PS Mosses)). Raja Gopal(Ashok Pandian). Bharathi Kannan(Keshav). Rajeev Kumar(Jayachandran). Naga Mahesh(Shekar). Saritha(Paarshava). Azim(Janani). Bharathi(G. Srinivas). Gokul(Krishna Rao). Aaryan(K Murali). Kunal(Sangeetha). Karthik Gandhi(Satya Krishna). Ramachander Rao(Prasad Bhel). Sudhanthiran(Saritha). Sujatha(Rama Bandi (as Suzie)). Regina Cassandra(Saroja Devi). Rajiv Kumar Aneja(L K Advani (uncredited)). Krishna Manjusha C(PMO Office (uncredited)). Phanindra Gollapalli(Congress MP (uncredited)). Virral Patel(Kanappan / Aanandhan (uncredited))

Languages Tamil. Telugu. Hindi

Producers Sankalp Acharekar. Kalol Das. Vishnuvardhan Induri. Satya Kishore. Brinda Prasad. Tirumal Reddy. Deepak Simhal. Shaailesh R Singh. Hitesh Thakkar.

Production Gothic Entertainment. Karma Media And Entertainment. Sprint Films
